titleStmt.title: The covenant of God with Abraham, opened. Wherein I. The duty of infant-baptism is cleared. II. Something added concerning the Sabbath, and the nature and increase of the kingdome of Christ. Together with a short discourse concerning the manifestations of God unto his people in the last dayes. Wherein is shewed the manner of the spirits work therein to be in the use of ordinary gifts, not by extraordinary revelations. / By William Carter minister of the gospel in London.
titleStmt.author: Carter, William, 1605-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.C. for John Rothwell, at the Fountain and Bear in Goldsmiths row in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
